protocol.text: Grow condition: described in Hernandez-Blanco et al, 2007
Plectosphaerella cucumerina inoculation: 3 week-old Arabidopsis plants were inoculated with a spore suspension (inoculated) or just water (mock)
RNA extraction described in Berrocal-lobo et al, 2002
cDNA was synthesized form 4 ug of total RNA using One-cycle target labeling and control reagents to produce biotin labeled cRNA
Expression levels of the genes were analyzed with Multiexperiment viewer software (MeV4.0) using two-way ANOVA with critical p-value =< 0,05.
